title: Customizing Rust Struct Output with fmt::Display
description: In this lab, you will learn how to implement the fmt::Display trait in Rust to customize the output appearance of a structure. You will also explore the difference between fmt::Display and fmt::Debug, as well as the limitations of fmt::Display for generic container types. Finally, you will have an activity to implement the fmt::Display trait for a new Complex struct and print it in a specific format.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Implementing fmt::Display Trait
meta.description: Learn how to implement the fmt::Display trait in Rust to customize the output appearance of a structure, explore the difference between fmt::Display and fmt::Debug, and implement the fmt::Display trait for a new Complex struct.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, fmt::Display, fmt::Debug, Complex, Struct

i18n.title: 使用fmt::Display自定义Rust结构体输出
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何在Rust中实现fmt::Display特性，以自定义结构体的输出外观。你还将探讨fmt::Display和fmt::Debug之间的区别，以及fmt::Display对通用容器类型的局限性。最后，你将进行一项活动，为新的Complex结构体实现fmt::Display特性，并以特定格式打印它。
